column2: The Redmond-based software maker is increasing performance pay and annual stock award ranges, CEO Satya Nadella said in a memo to employees. The move comes as Microsoft faces intense competition for talent, including from rival Amazon.
column3: Business/American City Business Journals•2 hours ago
column4: Microsoft to boost employee pay in effort to stop attrition

column2: Buffett's Berkshire added to Apple during the Q1 sell-off. It bet on oil stocks too, with details on Q1 buys, sells to come.
column4: Warren Buffett Stocks: Berkshire Hathaway Goes On Offense In Stock Market, Adds More Apple
